Main.TextJPN: ＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A4 サイコロの１』の出現条件を教えるわね。
Main.TextENG: I'll teach you the unlock condition for ``A4 A roll of a One`` in the World of Miyo Takano.

Main.TextJPN: ＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A1 @bやごうち.@<谷河内@>の採石場』@r＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A2 定期監査』@r＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A3 一二三四』@r…以上のカケラを見た後、選択できるようになるわよ。
Main.TextENG: ``A1 At a Quarry in Yagouchi`` in the World of Miyo Takano@r``A2 A Routine Inspection`` in the World of Miyo Takano@r``A3 One, Two, Three, Four`` in the World of Miyo Takano@r...After viewing the above pieces, you will be able to select this one.

Main.TextJPN: そして、@r＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A5 失意』@r＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A6 デジャヴ』@r＜V.南井巴の世界＞の『V6 サイコロの６』@r…以上のカケラの出現に関わってくるわよ。
Main.TextENG: Also, ``A5 Disappointment`` in the World of Miyo Takano@r``A6 Deja-vu`` in the World of Miyo Takano@rand ``V6 A 6 on the Dice`` in the World of Tomoe Minai@r...These additional fragments will be involved in their unlocking.
